document.full_text: volkswagen ag  may look to significantly expand its dealership base in the next three to four years, the chief executive of its america unit said in new york on monday.
document.title: volkswagen may add u.s. dealers next 3-4 years
lines_and_colors: volkswagen ag  may look to significantly expand its dealership base in the next three to four years, the chief executive of its america unit said in new york on monday.
